Posts.Content: Nov 27, 2018 06:31PM Dreamer54540 wrote: thank you, I had a lumpectomy with clean margins. All they told me on the phone is I got a zero and I don’t need cemo, I don’t have to see the Dr and they set me up for radiation. I went for the practice one, got the markings and the girl took pictures of my breast. When the other left she said oh the camera broke I’ll be right back and brought her personal cell phone in and took three pictures. Then she said I promise these will not end up on the internet, but I couldn’t find another camera. Today I call there and she said I’m sorry I deleted the pictures and they will take them over on this Monday. Just creeped out about all of this
Posts.Title: Radiation confusion Dreamer54540 viewfinder
